trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a solid color.
trans-unit.target: Pinta uma área com uma cor sólida.

trans-unit.source: For convenience, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes> class provides a set of commonly used SolidColorBrush objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>classe fornece um conjunto de objetos de SolidColorBrush usados com frequência, como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the SolidColorBrush class provides several special features: SolidColorBrush objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Recursos de Freezable:** porque ele herda o <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>classe, a classe SolidColorBrush fornece vários recursos especiais: SolidColorBrush objetos podem ser declarados como, compartilhados entre vários objetos, somente leitura para melhorar o desempenho, clonados e tornados thread-safe.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os diferentes recursos fornecidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos, consulte o [visão geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML Values *predefinedBrushName* The name of a brush defined by the class, such as or .
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` # # XAML valores *predefinedBrushName* o nome de um pincel definido pela classe, como ou .

trans-unit.source: *rgb* A three-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *RGB* um número hexadecimal de três dígitos que descreve esse pincel <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the second digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the third digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro dígito que especifica a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>valor, o segundo dígito Especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valor e o terceiro dígito Especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `00F`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `00F`.

trans-unit.source: *argb* A four-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *ARGB* um número hexadecimal de quatro dígitos que descreve esse pincel <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the second digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro dígito que especifica a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>valor, o segundo dígito especifica seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>de valor, o próximo dígito Especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valor e o dígito final especifica seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `F00F`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `F00F`.

trans-unit.source: *rrggbb* A six-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *rrggbb* um número hexadecimal de seis dígitos que descreve esse pincel <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Os dois primeiros dígitos especificar a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>valor, especifique as próximas duas seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valor e os dois finais especificam seus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `0000FF`.

trans-unit.source: *aarrggbb* An eight-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *aarrggbb* um número hexadecimal de oito dígitos que descreve esse pincel <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Os dois primeiros dígitos especificar a cor <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>valor, especifique as próximas duas seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>valor, especifique as próximas duas seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valor e os dois finais especificam seus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `FF0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `FF0000FF`.

trans-unit.source: *scA* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scA* <xref:System.Single> o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>valor desse pincel <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scR* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scR* <xref:System.Single> o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>valor desse pincel <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scG* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scG* <xref:System.Single> o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>valor desse pincel <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scB* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scB* <xref:System.Single> o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>valor desse pincel <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] perfil de cor.</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The alpha channel color value.
trans-unit.target: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> o valor de cor de canal alfa.</xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de valores é de 0,0 a 1,0.

trans-unit.source: *colorValue* A comma-delimited list of three to eight values that represent the color channels of the color profile.
trans-unit.target: *colorValue* uma lista delimitada por vírgulas de três a oito valores que representam os canais de cor do perfil de cor.

trans-unit.source: The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de valores é de 0,0 a 1,0.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> class with no color or animations.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> classe sem cor ou animações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The color to apply to the fill.
trans-unit.target: A cor a ser aplicada para o preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref>, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e as referências de recurso (mas eles não podem resolver) mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> era de propriedade<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> objeto, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências de recurso, associações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor desse <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a list of predefined colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de cores predefinidas, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors>

trans-unit.source: For a list of system colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de cores do sistema, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>classe.</xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: The brush's color.
trans-unit.target: A cor do pincel.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent*>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent*>

trans-unit.target: O leitor binário ao ler o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> do.
